str2: From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From thrao; a stately seat; by implication, power or a potentate.

str2: From ek and poreuomai; to depart, be discharged, proceed, project.
A flash of lightning, brightness, luster. From astrapto; lightning; by analogy, glare.
And, even, also, namely.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.
And, even, also, namely.
Thunder. Akin to bremo; thunder.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: To ignite, light, burn, lit. and met; I consume with fire. Apparently a primary verb; to set on fire, i.e. Kindle or consume.
Seven. A primary number; seven.
A torch, lamp, lantern. From lampo; a 'lamp' or flambeau.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

Seven. A primary number; seven.
Wind, breath, spirit.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
